summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Watch Face Studio with all 15 specified features. All core functionality working perfectly including face editor, Gallery View, complications, and live animations.
passed_tests: Watch Face Studio loads at /widget-os/faces with exactly 10 pre-made faces (Minimal, Gradient, Classic, Modular, Infograph, California, Numerals, Solar, Pride, Contour)
Create New button opens face editor with full functionality
Face editor has Digital/Analog style toggle buttons working correctly
Face editor has Show Seconds toggle switch functioning
Face editor has Background, Primary, Accent color pickers (3 color inputs found)
Face editor shows gradient presets section with 6 gradient options
Face editor shows complications checkboxes for all 8 complications (Date, Battery, Steps, Weather, Heart Rate, Timer, Now Playing, Notifications)
Gallery View button opens Apple Watch-style carousel modal
Gallery View shows navigation arrows (left/right) and face counter (1 / 10)
Gallery View has 'Set as Watch Face' button prominently displayed
Upload Image button triggers file input with image/* accept attribute
Connect Watch button visible and WebSerial API available
Live watch faces show real time with animated updates (14:46 â†’ 14:47 confirmed)
Faces show complications correctly (7 date, 2 battery, 3 steps, 2 weather complications found)
Search input filters faces by name functionality working
Face selection shows bottom action panel with Customize, Download, Flash buttons
Analog watch faces display rotating hands (58 rotating elements found)
Console panel toggle functionality working
Instructions section with 3 numbered steps present
Responsive grid layout with proper breakpoints
Complications are draggable in editor mode (cursor-move class)
WebSerial API integration for watch connectivity
